content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a gentleman named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the rental price of an apartment in München.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner at 10.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: Thank you for your time, Yi-Nuo. It seems like you had a positive experience with Peter Schmidt, even though you did not agree on a final price. Your high rating of his likeability suggests that the conversation was enjoyable and respectful. If there's anything else you'd like to add, please let me know.
name: Evaluator
